overview:
Adem T. Sengul is a highly skilled, technology savvy marketing professional with practical experience in and solid understanding of product/brand marketing and demand generation. He currently works as Marketing Programs Manager at PROS Pricing. Prior to that, he managed the marketing department at omNovia Technologies.

He has spoken at numerous events and written many articles on strategic management and market research. Adem holds a Masters Degree in Business Administration (M.B.A.) from Quinnipiac University and Bachelor of Arts degree in History from Yeditepe University, located at his home-town Istanbul, Turkey.

Adem regularly shares his thoughts, insights and opinions on business and technology at atsengul.com. Additionally, he volunteers his time to several professional /community organizations including American Marketing Association and Houston Technology Centerâ€™s Economic Development Committee.

Adem is also known as a strong advocate of complexity economics, which is a new model of economic thought that rejects traditional assumptions portraying the economy as a close system that eventually reaches an equilibrium.
